articles.description: Brie Larson's Cannes Film Festival Chanel looks all-of-the-time run continues.
articles.content:
Jury member Brie Larson attended the Chopard Trophy (Trophée Chopard) Awards held during the 2023 Cannes Film Festival in France. 
Yes. The actress is wearing another Chanel dress, but I have to say… [+851 chars]

articles.title: Buffy's James Marsters: “I would have killed Spike off in a heartbeat” - RadioTimes
articles.description: As the finale of Buffy the Vampire Slayer turns 20, Spike actor James Marsters speaks exclusively to RadioTimes.com.
articles.content: True to his word, here we are 20 years on from the airing of the finale episode of the wildly popular fantasy series starring Sarah Michelle Gellar as the Slayer. And we're delving into the story of … [+10832 chars]

articles.author: Sam Joseph Semon
articles.title: Sigourney Weaver dons a cream-colored jacket and matching pants during an after party in NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Alien star, who recently joined the cast of the Apple Original Films project The Gorge, wore a cream-colored jacket and a matching pair of wide-legged pants during the premiere and after party.
articles.content:
Sigourney Weaver attended the after party for the premiere of Master Gardener, which took place in New York City on Friday evening.
The 73-year-old performer was the epitome of chic in a fashionable… [+3692 chars]
